Može li novembar da bude Boaćijev mesec?
Reprezentativac Gane postigao prvenac u prvenstvu

03 Nov 2019

Znao je, ne tako davno, da u ovom periodu u sezoni već ima dvocifren broj golova na svom kontu. Međutim, Ričmond Boaći je u finišu meča protiv Proletera postigao tek prvi pogodak u Superligi Srbije. U Evropu ih ima četiri.
Takvom učinku kumovale su i brojne povrede, pošto je boaći odigrao svega pet mečeva u prvenstvu. Oporavio se u idealnom trenutku. Uoči dolaska Totenhema.„Drago mi je što sam ušao u igru i postigao gol. Svakom fudbaleru je najvažnije da igra, a pogotkom u Novom Sadu sam pokazao da je povreda prošlost. Golovi su ključni za samopouzdanje svakog napadača i želim da budem što efikasniji. Naravno, timski rezultat je najvažniji na kraju, ali prija mi kada se upišem u listu strelaca. Veliki deo posla uradio je Jevtović, iako je ušao samo minut pre čitave akcije. Izborio se za loptu, sjajno mi asistirao i nije mi bilo teško da je sprovedem u mrežu“, rekao je Boaći.
Nije Zvezdin napadač bio deo prošlogodišnjeg čuda protiv Liverpula. Golom u Novom Sadu nagovestio je da bi Vladan Milojević mogao ponovo da mu ukaže šansu u startnoj postavi.„Okrećemo se utakmici sa Totenhemom. Verujemo u sebe i znamo da naši navijači imaju velika očekivanja. Daćemo sve što je u našoj mogućnosti da ostvarimo pozitivan rezultat i uveren sam da ćemo prirediti dobru predstavu“.
Napadač iz Gane nije štedeo reči hvale na račun navijača.„Uvek je lepo igrati u Novom Sadu. Tribine budu pune naših navijača, stalno se čuje pesma i kada je tako, onda je mnogo lakše igrati. Zahvalio bih se svim zvezdašima koji su bili danas na utakmici, čime je napravljena lepa uvertira za susret sa Totenhemom koji igramo u okviru Lige šampiona. Na terenu nije bilo lako, ali najvažnije je da smo trijumfovali i da je naša mreža mirovala“.

Could November be Boaci's month?
Ghana national team debut

03 Nov 2019

He knew, not too long ago, that during this period of the season he already had double-digit goals on his account. However, Richmond Boaci scored only the first goal in the Super League of Serbia in the finals against Proleter. There are four of them in Europe.
Numerous injuries were a result of that, as Boachi played only five championship matches. He recovered at the ideal moment. On the eve of Tottenham's arrival. "I'm glad I got into the game and scored. The most important thing for every footballer is to play, and especially in Novi Sad I have shown that the injury is a thing of the past. Goals are key to the confidence of every striker and I want to be as efficient as possible. Of course, the team score is the most important in the end, but it pleases me when I get on the shooter list. Much of the work was done by Jevtovic, though he came in just a minute before the whole action. He fought for the ball, assisted me brilliantly and it was not difficult for me to put it into the net, "Boaci said.
Not the star striker was part of last year's miracle against Liverpool. A goal in Novi Sad indicated that Vladan Milojevic could once again give him a chance in the starting line-up. We believe in ourselves and know that our fans have high expectations. We will do everything we can to achieve a positive result and I am convinced that we will have a good show. "
The Ghanaian striker did not spare words of praise at the expense of fans. "It's always nice to play in Novi Sad. The stands are full of our fans, the song is constantly heard and when so, it is much easier to play. I would like to thank all the stars who were at the game today for making a nice overture for meeting Tottenham we play within the Champions League. It was not easy in the field, but most importantly, we were triumphant and our network was at a standstill. "
